definition: a group of soldiers, move or march as if in a crowd
details:
noun
- a group of soldiers
- a cavalry unit corresponding to an infantry company
- an orderly crowd
= example: an orderly crowd
= synonyms: flock
- a unit of Girl or Boy Scouts
= synonyms: scout troop, scout group
verb
- move or march as if in a crowd
= example: move or march as if in a crowd
- march in a procession
= synonyms: process
